Properties

Action Action

Edit

Gets the current action being taken with regard to this metric. Examples could be placement, balancing, and constraint checks.

public string Action { get; }Public ReadOnly Property Action As String
Value
String String

The current action being taken with regard to this metric.

ActivityThreshold ActivityThreshold

Edit

Gets the Activity Threshold specified for this metric in the system Cluster Manifest.

public long ActivityThreshold { get; }Public ReadOnly Property ActivityThreshold As Long
Value
Int64 Int64

The Activity Threshold specified for this metric in the system Cluster Manifest.

BalancingThreshold BalancingThreshold

Edit

Gets he balancing threshold for a certain metric.

public double BalancingThreshold { get; }Public ReadOnly Property BalancingThreshold As Double
Value
Double Double

The balancing threshold for a certain metric.

ClusterBufferedCapacity ClusterBufferedCapacity

Edit

The reserved percentage of cluster total capacity for this metric 

public long ClusterBufferedCapacity { get; }Public ReadOnly Property ClusterBufferedCapacity As Long
Value
Int64 Int64

ClusterBufferedCapacity property gets/sets the value of the long field, _clusterBufferedCapacity.

ClusterCapacity ClusterCapacity

Edit

Gets the total cluster capacity for a given metric, determined by summing the capacity for the metric across all nodes.

public long ClusterCapacity { get; }Public ReadOnly Property ClusterCapacity As Long
Value
Int64 Int64

The total cluster capacity for a given metric.

ClusterLoad ClusterLoad

Edit

Gets the total cluster load for a specific metric within the cluster

public long ClusterLoad { get; }Public ReadOnly Property ClusterLoad As Long
Value
Int64 Int64

The total cluster load.

ClusterRemainingBufferedCapacity ClusterRemainingBufferedCapacity

Edit

Gets the remaining percentage of cluster total capacity for this metric 

public long ClusterRemainingBufferedCapacity { get; }Public ReadOnly Property ClusterRemainingBufferedCapacity As Long
Value
Int64 Int64

The remaining percentage of cluster total capacity for this metric.

ClusterRemainingCapacity ClusterRemainingCapacity

Edit

Gets remaining capacity for the metric in the cluster. Remaining capacity is defined as the current Cluster Capacity minus the current Cluster Load.

public long ClusterRemainingCapacity { get; }Public ReadOnly Property ClusterRemainingCapacity As Long
Value
Int64 Int64

The remaining capacity for the metric in the cluster.

DeviationAfter DeviationAfter

Edit

Gets the standard average deviation of the metrics after resource balancer run.

public double DeviationAfter { get; }Public ReadOnly Property DeviationAfter As Double
Value
Double Double

The standard average deviation of the metrics after resource balancer run.

DeviationBefore DeviationBefore

Edit

Gets the standard average deviation of the metrics before resource balancer run.

public double DeviationBefore { get; }Public ReadOnly Property DeviationBefore As Double
Value
Double Double

The standard average deviation of the metrics before resource balancer run.

IsBalancedAfter IsBalancedAfter

Edit

Gets a value that indicates whether the metrics is balanced or not after resource balancer run.

public bool IsBalancedAfter { get; }Public ReadOnly Property IsBalancedAfter As Boolean
Value
Boolean Boolean

true if the metrics is balanced or not after resource balancer run; otherwise, false.

IsBalancedBefore IsBalancedBefore

Edit

Gets a value that indicates whether the metrics is balanced or not before resource balancer run.

public bool IsBalancedBefore { get; }Public ReadOnly Property IsBalancedBefore As Boolean
Value
Boolean Boolean

true if the metrics is balanced or not before resource balancer run; otherwise, false.

IsClusterCapacityViolation IsClusterCapacityViolation

Edit

Gets whether the metric is currently over capacity in the cluster.

public bool IsClusterCapacityViolation { get; }Public ReadOnly Property IsClusterCapacityViolation As Boolean
Value
Boolean Boolean

true if the metric is currently over capacity in the cluster; otherwise, false.

Gets the node id of the node with the maximum load for this metric 

public NodeId MaxNodeLoadNodeId { get; }Public ReadOnly Property MaxNodeLoadNodeId As NodeId
Value
NodeId NodeId

The node id of the node with the maximum load for this metric.

Edit

Gets the maximum load on any node for this metric.

Value
Int64 Int64

The maximum load on any node for this metric.

The node id of the node with the minimum load for this metric.

Gets the minimum load on any node for this metric.

Value
Int64 Int64

The minimum load on any node for this metric.

String String

The name of the metric.
